content: icy adult l/xl ear warmer / cowl is a cozy winter staple with big not today energy my gift to you knit wear and share knit in the round with us 5 and us 6 needles this pattern features bold charted colorwork chart only and works beautifully in lightweight worsted or heavyweight dk for a warm but not bulky winter make stay safe out there when things get ice y in every sense love and sass from mn ❄️
